DOC.brief_title: Transtibial Versus Anteromedial Femoral Tunnel Technique ACL Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: The anteromedial ( AM ) portal technique introduce position femoral tunnel anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction closely replicate original footprint compare transtibial ( TT ) approach.1-5 Few randomize trial evaluate difference technique respect clinical outcome . The purpose study determine difference clinical outcome AM TT approach .
DOC.criteria: sustained complete ACL tear ligament injury require surgical intervention concomitant collateral ligament tear significant chondromalacia ( base diagnostic image ) previous low limb surgery significant injury either low limb require surgery history arthritis unable comply rehabilitation protocol study followup pregnant female medical condition preclude participation .
